Minimum Test Frequency - 20m staggered per lane

Project Specific Notes / Instructions - The BB beam is a pavement response check to ensure that the design requirements will be met. DNZ Site Engineer to manage and check the BB results, on behalf of the design team, to flag sections that don't meet the following parameters:
○ If pre-cement modification BB > 2mm, then retest after cement modification
○ If post-cement modification BB > 2mm, then discuss wit Pavement Designer / Design Lead to asses the extent and reason for the higher deflection.
Detail of Activity / Test - Supply, pre-compact and trim to line and level with NZTA M/4 AP40
Minimum Test Frequency - Prior to stabilisation per section
Record documents (QCP - Quality Control Portal) - Surveyor
Responsibility - Stabilising Contractor with Main Contractor
